title: 45. MY Truth, YOUR Truth and THE TRUTH: America’s Battle Against Racism, Evil & The Karens
itunes:title: 45. MY Truth, YOUR Truth and THE TRUTH: America’s Battle Against Racism, Evil & The Karens
description: Originally published June 6th 2020, this episode was removed from all platforms after a couple of days for unknown reasons. We have been trying to re-upload since it was removed. If you are reading this it succeeded in posting. In the episode, Andy and the guys discuss the controversial events surrounding George Floyd, police brutality, and racism. The discussion continues into what is happening in our culture and how you can use the information provided to think for yourself independently of the MSM.
